page.title: 18GENERAL SIR JOHN HACKETT.
page.content: General Sir John Hackett lives in Cob- erley Mill.He chose to live there bec- ause he likes hills,water,stone houses and country.Sir John is a knight.He was made a knight because of his service in the army.His coat of arms is in Westminster Abbey in Henry 7th chapel.His coat of arms is a shield with a tool called a hacket and three hake fish.The supporters are a Pereg- rine Falcon and an Owl.He doesn't find being a knight makes any difference apart from you get called "Sir".He went to a Garden Party at Buckingham Palace where the Queen dubbed him knight.He met Elsa a person who had helped him during the war.Sir John is an author.He has written four books. The first book he had published was "I Was A Stranger"relating to his wartime experience.He wrote it in 1946-7 then he put it away until he
